definition: erhua variant of 小孩[xiao3 hai2]
Kinderdijk, village in the Netherlands with a large network of windmills attracting many tourists

sentences.english: It sounds like the crying of a baby.
sentences.chinese: 听起来像小孩的哭泣声。

sentences.english: Duggan, a father of four, died of a single gunshot wound to the chest, an inquest at north London Coroner's Court heard on Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 验尸报告称，这位四岁小孩的父亲被枪击中胸腔致死。

sentences.english: The child lived but had major medical problems including oxygen deprivation and bleeding in the brain.
sentences.chinese: 小孩存活了下来，但患有缺氧及脑出血等严重病症。

sentences.english: The film about the death of a young child was one that really tugged at my heartstrings.
sentences.chinese: 这部描写一个小孩之死的电影真让我揪心。

sentences.english: Because I diden't have enough, but now I do. the little boy replied.
sentences.chinese: 因为我之前不够，但我现在已经够了，小孩回答。

sentences.english: We'd like to have them from Africa and Asia as well.
sentences.chinese: “我们也希望有来自非洲和亚洲的小孩”。

sentences.english: THE old-fashioned financial system was like Old Maid, a parlour game once beloved of small children.
sentences.chinese: 老式的金融系统就象是小孩子喜欢玩的一种扑克牌。

sentences.english: I started to learn English when I was a child.
sentences.chinese: 当我海华丝一个小孩子的时辰，我就瞥绶学英语了。

sentences.english: Seems like only last week she was still just a bairn .
sentences.chinese: 好像几个星期前她还只是个小孩呢。

sentences.english: Children under 18 are not admitted to this film.
sentences.chinese: 未满18岁的小孩不得入场看这部电影。

sentences.english: But can there be any sense in texting toddlers?
sentences.chinese: 但是，这对于向小孩发短信有意义吗？

sentences.english: Talk with children about human bodies and how they work.
sentences.chinese: 和小孩谈人类的身体，以及它们怎样工作。

sentences.english: Ah, I said, when we these children can easily lives?
sentences.chinese: 哎，我说，何时我们这些命苦的小孩才能轻松呢？

sentences.english: The naughty child dumped his cup of milk in the sink.
sentences.chinese: 那个顽皮的小孩把他那一杯牛奶倒到水槽里。

sentences.english: Nowaddays parents bring up their children too leniently .
sentences.chinese: 现在的父母都太宠小孩了。

sentences.english: The emotional body is nothing else than the child within you.
sentences.chinese: 情绪身体无外乎就是你内心的小孩。

definition: erhua variant of 小孩[xiao3 hai2]
old man or woman/the elderly/one's aged parents or grandparents
head of a household/family head/patriarch/parent or guardian of a child
